snippet: In her new book, Gail Collins focuses on Texas’s staggering inequality, casual embrace of crony capitalism and creaky educational pipeline. But her concern is that the state itself is everyone’s problem.
abstract: Erica Grieder reviews book As Texas Goes...How the Lone Star State Hijacked the American Agenda by Gail Collins.
lead_paragraph: In her new book, Gail Collins focuses on Texas’s staggering inequality, casual embrace of crony capitalism and creaky educational pipeline. But her concern is that the state itself is everyone’s problem.

headline.main: Everything There Is Big, Stereotypes Included
headline.print_headline: Everything There Is Big, Stereotypes Included
